main event: An unidentified object was reported in the sky above Covington, Georgia, observed over a period of 30 minutes.
interesting points: Numerous residents including a policeman witnessed the object,The object was described as maneuverable and reddish white in color,The object drifted slowly and was estimated to be 30 to 35 feet in diameter,The lack of physical evidence and specific details led to the conclusion of insufficient evidence for evaluation,The sighting occurred around 10:10 PM on December 9, 2002.
sighted object: an unidentified aerial object possibly resembling a ball of fire
witness description: Several residents including a policeman on duty
